General.Name: GRIPM Advanced Materials Co. Ltd. A
General.Description: GRIPM Advanced Materials Co., Ltd. engages in the design, research and development, production, and sales of advanced non-ferrous metal powder materials in China and internationally. The company provides copper-based metal powder materials, microelectronic interconnect materials, and 3D printing powder materials, as well as electrolytic copper, atomized copper, copper alloy, tin, infiltration copper, FeCu pre-alloy, fine pre-alloyed, fine copper and cobalt, and CuSn diffusion powders. Its products are used in powder metallurgy, superhard tools, microelectronic interconnect packaging, friction materials, catalysts, electrical alloys, electrical carbon products, conductive materials, thermal management materials, 3D printing, and other applications. GRIPM Advanced Materials Co., Ltd. was founded in 2004 and is headquartered in Beijing, China.
